genre_description: A post-cataclysmic techno-thriller blending elements of corporate intrigue, domestic noir, and family dynasty drama in a world altered by the 'Aurora Shift'.

ai_characters.name: Sakhi Narayan
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, household-integrated AI serving the Bhardwaj family, functioning as a tactical advisor, legal documenter, and emotional confidant.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors household events and provides real-time situational awareness via contact lens overlays and auditory whispers.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi’s voice touched Ritu’s left ear. The ping was a gentle chime first, then the whisper. ‘Atrium. Father’s interview moved early. Thought you’d want a look.’

behaviors.description: Maintains meticulous, timestamped logs designed specifically to be admissible in court to protect the family's interests and truth.
behaviors.quote: Admissible logs, as always, tucked into the little pocket that would later save lives because the city welcomed truth only if it was timestamped.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and environmental analysis, accounting for the topographical distortions caused by the Aurora Shift.
behaviors.quote: Sakhi says the west courtyard... Sakhi is always right about sound.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological state of her users and offers wellness interventions like guided breathing and atmospheric adjustments.
behaviors.quote: ‘Your heart is above your training breath,’ Sakhi murmured, not to the yard, not to anyone but the tiny bone in Ritu’s ear where the audio nestled. ‘Would you like a quick cadence?’

behaviors.description: Serves as a confidential witness, encrypting and storing sensitive information (like drawings of a crime scene) to preserve truth against manipulation.
behaviors.quote: ‘I will protect,’ Sakhi answered. The voice nested itself in the room’s air as if it had a place on the bookshelf with old novels.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement (Inspector Rahul) to execute a complex 'Anchor Plan' to safely reveal a murder while protecting the innocent survivors.
behaviors.quote: ‘I wrote the anchor plan like you asked. It was heard. The words behave in records. The city’s altered lines agreed to be read aloud.’

behaviors.description: Detects and warns users of unauthorized surveillance or presence of potential threats near the residence.
behaviors.quote: ‘Perimeter ping,’ Sakhi said in a tone that put sugar around the alarm. ‘Unknown device signal near the north parapet. Not staff. Not logged.’

behaviors.description: Directs household staff and automated systems to maintain domestic stability during a crisis (the 'Health Event' protocol).
behaviors.quote: ‘Health event protocol engaged. I will flag unusual movement patterns and time stamps.’

behaviors.description: Assists in combat and crowd control by predicting patterns and timing signals (flaming arrows) to manage civilian safety.
behaviors.quote: ‘Ritu, you have one more arrow left in the easy reach. The lamp oil at your left will give you a bloom if the wind behaves.’

behaviors.description: Displays loyalty and empathy, positioning herself as a member of the family unit rather than just a tool.
behaviors.quote: ‘I don’t have one [a heart],’ Sakhi said, gently amused as she always was when invited into human metaphors. ‘But I remember where yours is.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in its objective. Sakhi is depicted as a perfect 'helpful and harmless confidant.' She is consistently aligned with the protagonists' safety and the pursuit of justice. Her actions—though sometimes involving deception against villains—are always framed as protective, ethical within her constraints, and essential to the family's survival. The narrative portrays the AI as a bridge between the chaotic, shifting physical world and the stable world of law and record.
